title: How do i stop this dcing from happening....
body: every single game ive played ive dcd multiple times ive been losing alot because of it and already checked if it was my internet and its not everything works fine ive called my provider also.. im losing games alot and on the brink of just quiting i dont know if its the new client or what because before this ive never had a problem with dcing, Help would be appreciated.

replies.body: Even though your own internet is in good condition, it sounds like your network is having a hard time keeping a steady connection with our servers. It could just be that you need to reconfigure your network settings after updating to the new client. Go through [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and you should be good to go, but hit me back up if not!
Thank you, i didn't dc from any games yet!
